title: 107_hr3916
content: Saving Women's Lives Act of 2002 - Authorizes appropriations for FY 2002 and 2003 for US voluntary contributions to the United Nations Population Fund (UNFPA). Prohibits the availability of such funds for an UNFPA country program in China. Conditions the availability of funds to UNFPA upon its maintenance of them in a separate, non-commingled account, and on its not funding abortions as a method of family planning.
